Banyuwangi Tuan Rumah Liga Selancar Dunia 2020
01 Nov 2019, 15:40 by David Priyasidarta (Kontributor), Ariandono
TEMPO.CO, Banyuwangi - Kabupaten Banyuwangi akan menjadi tuan rumah seri ke-3 World Surf League (WSL) Championship Tour 2020. Sebanyak 54 peselancar terbaik dunia akan mengikuti ajang selancar paling bergengsi di dunia. Kejuaraan Dunia Selancar tersebut yang bakal digelar di Pantai Plengkung (G-Land), Banyuwangi, 4-14 Juni 2020.
Bupati Banyuwangi Abdullah Azwar Anas mengatakan, kabar itu disampaikan Steven Roberston, Manajer WSL Asia. WSL adalah badan pengelola ajang selancar dunia.
”Kami sudah bertemu tim WSL Asia. Rapat WSL di AS memutuskan satu dari 11 seri kompetisi selancar terbaik dunia 2020 akan digelar di Banyuwangi. Ini kalau di tenis ya semacam grand slam-nya yang hanya empat event dalam setahun. Jadi sangat membanggakan bagi Banyuwangi,” ujar Anas, Jumat, 1 November 2019.
WSL Championship Tour adalah liga selancar paling bergengsi di dunia. Tur ini berisi 11 ajang selancar yang biasanya dimulai sejak April-Desember setiap tahunnya di berbagai pantai di dunia. Tahun ini, WSL Championship Tour antara lain digelar di Australia, Amerika Serikat, Brazil, Hawaii, Tahiti, Afrika Selatan, Portugal, hingga Prancis.
”Banyak daerah di belahan dunia lain yang sangat berminat menjadi tuan rumah. Kami bersyukur, justru Banyuwangi dipilih WSL. Saya akan sampaikan kabar baik ini ke Gubernur Jatim Ibu Khofifah dan pemerintah pusat agar bisa dimanfaatkan sebagai momen menggaungkan pariwisata Banyuwangi, Jatim, dan Indonesia,” kata Anas.
Anas menambahkan, momen WSL Championship Tour sangat sayang untuk dilewatkan karena event ini menduduki peringkat atas liga olahraga yang digemari penduduk dunia setelah sepak bola, basket, dan football.
”Social engagement ajang ini sangat tinggi. Bahkan, percakapan tentang WSL Championship Tour di dunia maya selalu mampu mengalahkan MotoGP yang hanya menduduki peringkat 9. Penyelenggaraan WSL akan diliput belasan TV asing yang coverage-nya bisa mencapai 643 juta penonton," ujar Anas mengutip data WSL.
“Secara ekonomi bakal sangat menggerakkan ekonomi lokal karena setelah ajang ini para penggemar selancar seluruh dunia pasti kian tertarik ke Banyuwangi,” imbuhnya.
Manajer WSL Asia, Steven Robertson, menjelaskan, Banyuwangi dipilih karena perhatian pemerintah daerahnya yang cukup besar pada pengembangan sport tourism.
"Saat pertemuan di Amerika Serikat, kami memilih G-Land sebagai satu dari 11 seri yang akan kami gelar 2020. Kami siapkan dana USD 2,5 juta (sekitar Rp 35 miliar). Saya pikir, Banyuwangi adalah daerah yang tepat karena pemerintahnya sudah terbiasa menggelar event sport tourism,” kata Steven.
Steven menjelaskan, G-Land dipilih karena tidak hanya punya ombak bagus, namun lokasinya yang berada di kawasan taman nasional adalah keelokan tersendiri.
"Ini akan menjadi cerita menarik bagi peselancar dunia. Mereka bakal berselancar di pantai yang berada di tengah hutan elok. Experience semacam ini akan menjadi cerita positif di kalangan peselancar seluruh dunia," kata Steven.
G-Land berada di kawasan Taman Nasional Alas Purwo. Hutan ini telah ditetapkan sebagai geopark nasional dan Cagar Biosfer Dunia oleh UNESCO. G-Land dikenal salah satu lokasi selancar terbaik di dunia karena ombaknya yang khas, besar, dan membentuk terowongan.
DAVID PRIYASIDHARTA
text:
Banyuwangi Hosts the 2020 World Surfing League
01 Nov 2019, 15:40 by David Priyasidarta (Contributor), Ariandono
TEMPO.CO, Banyuwangi - Banyuwangi Regency will host the 3rd series of the World Surf League (WSL) Championship Tour 2020. A total of 54 of the world's best surfers will take part in the world's most prestigious surfing event. The World Surfing Championship which will be held at Plengkung Beach (G-Land), Banyuwangi, 4-14 June 2020.
Banyuwangi Regent Abdullah Azwar Anas said the news was delivered by Steven Roberston, WSL Asia Manager. WSL is the world surfing event management body.
"We have met the WSL Asia team. The WSL meeting in the US decided that one of the 11 best 2020 surfing competitions in the world would be held in Banyuwangi. This is in tennis, it's a kind of grand slam, which only has four events a year. So it is very proud of Banyuwangi, "Anas said, Friday, November 1, 2019.
WSL Championship Tour is the most prestigious surfing league in the world. This tour contains 11 surfing events that usually start from April to December each year on various beaches in the world. This year, the WSL Championship Tour will be held in Australia, the United States, Brazil, Hawaii, Tahiti, South Africa, Portugal and France.
"Many regions in other parts of the world are very interested in becoming a host. We are grateful, instead, Banyuwangi was chosen by WSL. I will convey this good news to East Java Governor Mrs. Khofifah and the central government so that it can be used as a moment to echo Banyuwangi, East Java and Indonesia tourism, "Anas said.
Anas added, the WSL Championship Tour moment was a pity to miss because this event was ranked at the top of the sports league that is popular with the world's population after soccer, basketball and football.
"The social engagement of this event is very high. In fact, conversations about the WSL Championship Tour in cyberspace are always able to beat MotoGP which is only ranked 9. The holding of WSL will be covered by dozens of foreign TVs whose coverage can reach 643 million viewers, "Anas quoted WSL data.
"The economy will greatly move the local economy because after this event surf fans around the world will definitely be increasingly attracted to Banyuwangi," he added.
WSL Asia's manager, Steven Robertson, explained, Banyuwangi was chosen because of the local government's considerable attention to the development of sport tourism.
"During the meeting in the United States, we chose G-Land as one of the 11 series we will hold in 2020. We prepared USD 2.5 million (around Rp 35 billion). I think, Banyuwangi is the right area because the government is used hold a sport tourism event, "Steven said.
Steven explained, G-Land was chosen because not only has good waves, but its location in the national park area is its own beauty.
"This will be an interesting story for world surfers. They will surf on the beach in the middle of a beautiful forest. Experience like this will be a positive story among surfers around the world," said Steven.
G-Land is in the Alas Purwo National Park area. This forest has been designated as a national geopark and World Biosphere Reserve by UNESCO. G-Land is known as one of the best surfing locations in the world because of its distinctive, large, and tunnel-shaped waves.
DAVID PRIYASIDHARTA
